notes: The Dynamic Syntactic Atlas of the Dutch dialects (DynaSAND) is an on-line tool for dialect syntax research. DynaSAND consists of a database, a search engine, a cartographic component and a bibliography.
title: DynaSAND (Dynamic Syntactic Atlas of the Dutch dialects)
